tweet: @andybodders enjoying The Who. Can you locate The Beatles' Chains? Came up in conversation at party last night. Can't get it out of my mind!
@andybodders where are my shades? I've thrown away the seaweed. You're now my private weather forecaster & it's sunshine all the way!
@ewinkler You and I met sometime. I think it was at the London screening of Future of Food a few years' ago. I also Tweet from @foodiegirlUK
@ewinkler Scary but true. If one is considering "eating organic" dairy products should be the first on the list to buy. The most important!
@andybodders it's brightening as we speak! Still pissing down but certainly a gleam breaking through from the west. I do have hopes.......
